works like a charm on win7 c64 WITH a DosBox.
Just mount your dosbox folder and cd drive, the cd drive as a cd drive duh.
From the cd under heroes2 folder run install.
It'll install the game on to the designated/mounted dosbox folder.

Still might want to get the gold version with the expansion set.
